{{Marvel Database:Organization Template | Image = Namor McKenzie (Earth-616) from Fantastic Four Annual Vol 1 1 001.jpg | Name = Atlantean Royal Family | Aliases = | Leaders = [[Namor McKenzie (Earth-616)|Namor]] | CurrentMembers = [[Aquaria Neptunia (Earth-616)|Aquaria Nautica Neptunia]], [[Llyron McKenzie (Earth-616)|Llyron]] | FormerMembers = [[Kamar (Earth-616)|Kamar]], [[Namorita Prentiss (Earth-616)|Namorita]], [[Talan (Earth-616)|Talan]]
See [[:Category:Atlantean Royal Family]] for a full listing and [[Atlantean Royal Family Tree]] for a brief glimpse into the history. | Identity = Public | Affiliation = | Allies = | Enemies = | Origin = Royal family of [[Atlantis]] | Reality = Earth-616 | Status = Active | BaseOfOperations = [[Atlantis]] | PlaceOfFormation = [[Atlantis]] | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = | First = | History = The ruling family of [[Atlantis]] has its origins dating back to earlier than 6,000 BC. The full history of the family is not widely known but its origins include the ruling families of two separate nomadic tribes of [[Homo mermanus]] who fought over control of the ruins of Atlantis. The brothers [[Orrek (Earth-616)|Orrek]] and [[Stegor (Earth-616)|Stegor]]] fought with the tribe of [[Tanas (Earth-616)|Tanas]] and his wife, [[Elanna (Earth-616)|Elanna]]. Their children, [[Kamuu (Atlantean) (Earth-616)|Kamuu]] (son of Stegor) and [[Zartra (Atlantean) (Earth-616)|Zartra]] (daughter of Tanas and Elanna) would marry, uniting the two tribes and allowing them them to re-take Atlantis.{{Citation}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Atlantean Royal Family]] [[Category:Atlantis (Kingdom)]] [[Category:Atlantean Organizations]]
